name: Only Way Out (Woffels)
description:
I solo developed this Metroidvania during one weekend for Global Game Jam 2022. It was a big milestone for my Godot learning. This is also my first published Godot project.

GGJ2022 Jam theme was "duality".

Jam page: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/only-way-4
